title: Lvl 34 today and Gues WHAT !?
body:
level 34 

2 sivir (for 90 blue essence x2) and 1x gp (for 600 blue essence) 

**Thanks riot** ! 

Perhaps that in 2030 i would be able to buy urfwick and that in march i will be able to buy the next champ which is zoe ! 

i'm a veteran player  i had tons of lp. I played a lot and I unlocked every  single characters over the years and bought most of the runes (i only got like 120k blue essence)

Thank you rito games I

Otherwise** murillo** are you there, my boy ? (if you didn't know in the past morello was a lead designer  working for riot games. HE was the god of the **nerf hammer** punishing irelia many times)

**Murillo**, we need your wise work for new runes, twitch, ''yasuo'', perhaps zoe and OF COURSE irelia :D we all know you love to hit that butt !


WHERE IS DIVERSITY ?!  everyone has the same runes every champ has to be played Stricly AD or Stricly AP (you removed all the diversity in ratios). Everyone looks the same players loose their identity !

Thank you riot we all look like bots playing in a simulation...



===> _ **About you !**
_

By the way guys can you stop defending riot games when they do mistakes ? ask what veteran players think about riot politics and their evolution. 

If they fail they have to assume it. If you do not unite we will never change things. Are you a sheep  following the god rito ? or are you a human with a brain ?

If Americans  didn't made revolutionnary war you still be under the controll of a queen same for europeans and french revolution. 

Don't let Riot Money games screw this game anymore. It was a funny  game before and new players don't even suspect how the game was fun in the past... they would be very impressed if they could play vintage lol...

If you want Riot to become the EA Games of Mobas okay let them do guys...




===> **From ~~made in US~~ to Made in China politics !**


by the way guys did you know that riot games and lol were made by americans !

however a chinese company that only cares about money bought the game in 2015

many of the old riot employees left the company cause they reworked the initial vision of the game and some concepts of it !  many of them work for big companies like blizzard now. some were fired because they opened their mouth and didn't agree with what the chinese invester wanted.



since the game has changed a lot  !

replies.body:
Has *ANYONE* in the entire *WORLD* hit level 50 yet?

Christ this systems been out a week and you've already leveled FOUR times.

> [{quoted}](name=Old Man Teeto,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z0J9JWeH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-12T17:15:31.828+0000)
>
> Has *ANYONE* in the entire *WORLD* hit level 50 yet?
> 
> Christ this systems been out a week and you've already leveled FOUR times.

I have someone in my friendslist level 38, I myself am one game before level 36.
wtf do you play 24 hours a day?

> [{quoted}](name=MOuHahaHAhahaaaa,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z0J9JWeH,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2017-11-13T07:36:10.632+0000)
>
> No but i don't watch TV, i barely watch it once a month or once  every 2 month. You have everything on your computer. Considering that majority of human beings without even knowing it spare 1/3 or 1/4 of their lifetime on TV i prefer to play or to watch documentary movies instead. Yeah that's it... I have friends, i go out like every one of us, One GF and i go to the cinema too. Its just a matter of how you spend your time...

He wasn't asking you. When not in general discussion you should be using discussion view not chronological.

> [{quoted}](name=Wimbledofy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z0J9JWeH,comment-id=00020000000000010000,timestamp=2017-11-13T07:49:58.445+0000)
>
> He wasn't asking you. When not in general discussion you should be using discussion view not chronological.

oh thx i rarely use the boards :I ! It's just i can't stand the actual evolution of the game... I don't want that people think that i'm like the guy who criticize everything. However i'm a player since season 2 and riot never consider those old players in terms of gameplay and that makes us sick...
I play like 10 - 5 games a day, which makes up for roughly 6 - 8 hours a day which is quite normal when you consider it a hobby.
{{champion:202}} approves

urfwicks not intended for people with "normal" BE numbers, such as someone with only 1k BE or 6k BE that skins meant for veteran players that probably own all the champions they want and have a shit ton of BE saved up just because they have no reason to spend it BUT i do understand where your comming from, i dont think ill have enough BE for the new champion either when she comes out.
dude literally said he was sitting at 120k...
oh i didnt read the whole passage. im lazy

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z0J9JWeH,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2017-11-13T02:29:17.088+0000)
>
> oh i didnt read the whole passage. im lazy

If you like the game in his current state yeah stay lazy and don't try to make the things change. :) you'll see how the game will change. paying 2x more for skins and you will have to play 5x more to unlock a champ good luck kiddo.

Not gonna lie as a whole I LOVE these changes, there are a few kinks of course, but I think in two months riot will be able to find a solution. I really cant understand the negativity, as for the first time in a while I've actually wanted to play the game solo instead of just with friends.
In the words of Karlie Redd: "The bit*h is crazy she physcho, thats why they put mental people in straight  jackets﻿"
maybe you should get less sodium in your diet man

Stop whining and just do what I did and buy $150 of loot boxes to disenchant for Urfwick.
.
..
...
(I didn't really)
The essence shop isn't going to remain open for that long. Urfwick was a special gift to the players who basically had nothing to spend their IP on and horded it for years.
Riot has said that they plan on bringing the BE store back in the future, but like once a year for a week or so.
Which is pretty garbage, as is the BE shop to be fair.
You can't call it a gift when you have to buy it.

> [{quoted}](name=Xonra,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z0J9JWeH,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-11-13T01:58:15.213+0000)
>
> You can't call it a gift when you have to buy it.

Yes I can considering they didn't have to re-release it at all, and they didn't even charge money for it. I can only imagine how many players get pissed off when skins representing events they were there for are suddenly re-released and obtainable again. But I never see Urfwick, and I do mean never.

You clearly don't know what a gift is.

It is literally "a thing given willingly to someone without payment"

So, maybe know what a gift is before calling it a gift, then trying to argue the point. Payment isn't automatically Dollars. Do I need to give you the definition of payment as well?

> [{quoted}](name=Xonra,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z0J9JWeH,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-15T03:23:12.476+0000)

Oh, I'm sorry that what is CLEARLY A FUCKING GIFT for people who have nothing to spend their IP on and earned so much of it is beyond your fucking comprehension. Maybe YOU should update your vocabulary, and kindly step on a lego.

Could be worse.

You could get a 90 BE Warwick shard for reaching level 37

And 270 Be forget which shard 

Pretty much BS amount.

I just hit level 32 XD

First capsule got around 1,500.

Second Capsule got around 800 BE

"Perhaps that in 2030 i would be able to buy urfwick"

If only he wasn't now available ONLY in the BE shop, and the BE shop is closing in November :(

My champ shards so far from 2 capsules:

Soraka
Lux
Nasus
Nunu
Kassadin
If this shit keeps on doing on, I'll be playing some HOTS.

> [{quoted}](name=DragonShea,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z0J9JWeH,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-11-12T19:57:24.816+0000)
>
> If this shit keeps on doing on, I'll be playing some Dota 2.

Fixed.

lvl 35 half way to 36 now. I need that urfwick ! -.-' . 

By the way in around 40 games played average game lengh : 25min, first turrets down at  : 8-10min, at 10 min in 70% of the games there was a strong lead in gold and scores always looked like 3 14 or 8 0. Tanks look like paper except for the lifesteal ones and regens ones.   PLASURE ????!!!

Steamroll or get steamrolled.  No pleasure. Challenge to recover from mistakes NONE cause in most of the cases you just can't.  Most of the characters spam : GP, wukong, Nasus, Varus, Jinx, Twitch, Jax. If you encounter them on the opponent side and if he is not a bot you are screwed.  

This game is actually so unbalanced that yasuo look like a random shit compared to other characters. AT least they managed to solve the issue about yasuos complains with new runes LOL
If you get a champ shard that you dont own yet, you can buy that champ with 40% off... Did you know that? Also, you don't have to spend on runes anymore and got some money back for them

why would any1 want urfwick this skin sucks 

i had 154k be and didnt even think about getting it i'd rather get chromas/the ward skin and so on

Yeah level 34 offers 3 champ skins (random but skewed toward common)

As your level goes up you get more and more and prioritized more toward higher BE champs.
Posts like this are why Riot looks at Reddit instead of here, less monkies posting

> [{quoted}](name=Seto Kaìba,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Z0J9JWeH,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-11-12T20:08:02.320+0000)
>
> Posts like this are why Riot looks at Reddit instead of here, less monkies posting

Man i'm asking you : when did you begin to play lol ?

old players remember how old Riot before it was bought by a chinese company  listened his client and discussed with them...

Now it's just a buisness between making money and creating a competitive game because they fear that on day Dota and Hots will perhaps take the advantage in the esports aspect. In 2015 a chinese company bought the game...

by the way If you prefer reddit why are you there ? -_- ?!

lmao have you seen Reddit this week?

This shit is TAME comparitively.
